item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

Im using an allstar based source, and i cant get the npc’s to attack you back and so on, + I would like to know how to make some npcs Agressive and attack you on sight, (like jad does)

  • I Would be very happy if someone could explain why only npc’s added in item2.java drops items and how to add more,
    It looks like this For example:

public static int KQ[] = { 2633, 2635, 2637, 2978, 2980, 2982, 2984, 2986, 2988, 2990, 2992, 2994, 2957, 2653, 2655, 2659, 3478, 2665, 2661, 2663, 2667, 3479, 2673, 2669}; public static int randomKQ() { return KQ[(int) (Math.random() * KQ.length)]; }

Help annyone ? (Aa’ Thanx.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2009, 01:30:44 pm[/size][hr]I know someone must know this,

Yeah i’ve ben using both Google and The Search bar (Y)
